page.title: 11Shops in N/Ham/Coll P
page.content: There is no large shopping area in North Hammersmith and College Park, but there are several small parades of shops for people to buy various items. Most of the shops are connected with food, either selling food or as a take -away hot food shop. Other shops include do it yourself,florist, motor accessory shops,estate agents,post office,building society,travel agents and Banks. The shops are open from 9a.m. to 6p.m.Monday to Friday.Some newspaper shops and food shops also open on a Sunday too. Most shops are self-service,where people choose their goods and pay for them at a check out. Most people in the area would like a shopping area with large shops especially for food and clothes.In Shepherds Bush there is an open street market for food,clothes and electrical items.
